mapper.insert: insert into scheduleDate(showdb_id, showDate, showTime, showPrice) values(#{param1},#{param2},#{param3},#{param4})
mapper.select: select id, showdb_id, showDate, showTime from scheduleDate
select id, showdb_id, showDate, showTime, showPrice from scheduleDate where id=#{param1}
select a.id, a.showdb_id, a.showDate, a.showTime, a.showPrice, b.name, b.place_name from scheduleDate as a inner join showdb as b on a.showdb_id=b.id where a.id=#{param1}
select username, tel, zipcode, road_name, addr from user where id=#{param1}
mapper.insert: insert into order_list(no, user_id, scheduleDate_id, imp_uid, oknum, price, addr, email) values(#{param1},#{param2},#{param3},#{param4},#{param5},#{param6},#{param7},#{param8})
insert into seat(seat_num, order_list_no, seatcnt) values(#{param1},#{param2},#{param3})
mapper.select: select a.no, b.name, b.mainposter, b.place_name, c.showDate, c.showTime, d.seatcnt, e.username, d.seat_num, a.price from order_list as a inner join scheduleDate as c on a.scheduleDate_id = c.id inner join showdb as b on b.id=c.showdb_id inner join seat as d on a.no=d.order_list_no inner join user as e on a.user_id=e.id where a.no=#{param1}
